alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 1:52AM CDT until May 09 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 230 AM CDT/130 AM MDT/. * At 152 AM CDT/1252 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles west of Brownlee, or 22 miles north of Mullen, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Elsmere, Brownlee, Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, Wood Lake, Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Marsh Flat, Giant Hill, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek, Highway 83 crossing Goose Creek and Highway 83 crossing the North Loup River. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 222 and 223. Highway 97 between mile markers 73 and 107. Highway 83 between mile markers 160 and 191. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
